summary: A scientist and his sidekick accidentally clone a journalist and decide to turn the mistake into Repli-Kate, their idea of the perfect woman, who loves, beer, football and frat parties.

Jay Popoff|Jeremy Popoff|Allen Shellenberger|George Alan|Daniel Dehring|Garrett Hauenstein
keywords: camera shot of a woman's bare feet|gerbil|biting someone|replicator|science magazine reporter
title: Repli-Kate
